author: dapplion
content:
To EIP editors, what would you recommend as author list for an EIP derived from a wide research effort with contributions from multiple researchers and cryptographers? This is a consensus layer only EIP that summarizes this etheresearch post https://ethresear.ch/t/whisk-a-practical-shuffle-based-ssle-protocol-for-ethereum/11763 , EIP pre-draft: https://github.com/dapplion/EIPs/pull/1

Note that the etheresearch post is meant to remain as the complete and canonical source of EIP background, rationale and security considerations.

author: g11tech
content: authors are generally people responsible to maintain the EIP and doesn't reflect the `credits` list

author: dapplion
content: is the credits list a field in the EIP?

author: g11tech
content: i don't think so, may be it can be added
